description: The Bebop crew consists of Spike Spiegel, a laid-back bounty hunter with a mysterious past; Jet Black, a former police officer and the ship's pragmatic captain; Faye Valentine, a cunning and unpredictable bounty hunter with amnesia; Edward Wong Hau Pepelu Tivrusky IV, a quirky teenage hacker; and Ein, an intelligent dog.  They travel the galaxy, taking on bounty hunting jobs while grappling with their individual past traumas and forming complex relationships.
